author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1705776175}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198836331185', 'num_games_owned': 844, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1689311440}
review:
[h1] Snake Party [/h1]
[hr]
[code] It would be greatly appreciated if you would rate this review with a prize, although it is not necessary. If you want to read more reviews like this follow me as a mentor. If you want to discuss the reviews and talk to other people in my Steam group. The links: [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/43972666/] My Mentor Page [/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/GuacamoleCenterENG] My Group Page [/url] [/code]

Snake Party is a game to play with friends, as you literally have nothing to do if you're not playing with someone. In this game you have to avoid colliding with walls and other players because otherwise you will die, if you are the last player standing you will win a round/point and in the menu you can select how many rounds/points someone needs to win. Another thing about this game is that it has 4 different songs, but I don't know if they are my own or someone else's.

[h1] Players + Settings [/h1]
[hr]
Up to 6 people can play at the same time in this game and for this reason there are 6 different colors for each player, there are the colors: Light Blue, Blue, Purple, Green, Yellow and Red. One thing to highlight is that this game has personalized names for your snakes, in addition to this you can individually deactivate the sound and music separately, something that is appreciated and finally you can also configure the keys of each player (actually they only deal with two buttons, one to turn left and the other to turn right).

[h1] Powers [/h1]
[hr]
This game also has three powers: the "Speedpills" that make your snake go faster for a while, the "Wormholes" that will move you to a random place on the map and finally the "Paintbuckets" these will change the color of your snake. snake for a very short time.

[h1] Game problems [/h1]
[hr]
This is a game to play with friends, but even with them they will get bored very easily, since you don't really have much to do or many mechanics, besides this the "Wormholes" power becomes useless, because it may teleport you stuck to a wall and die instantly, also the rounds you want to play you have to select manually by raising the arrow and not writing a number, so if you want many rounds you will have to spam the click, in addition to this the power "Paintbuckets" literally does not It is useless and the worst thing is that it dyes your snake for almost 5 seconds, becoming the worst power of all together with the "Wormholes" power if you are unlucky, making the only power that really works if it is not very close to a wall is the "Speedpills" and finally there is a bug that from time to time the snake leaves no trace and this can affect you when trying to confine or ambush your friends.

I hope this review has helped you, I know it's a garbage game, but I want to take the time to write "professional" reviews of even this type of game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198796851430', 'num_games_owned': 927, 'num_reviews': 3722, 'playtime_forever': 6186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 960, 'last_played': 1651750642}
review:
《Snake Party》这款派对游戏，原本以独特的蛇形玩法和多人互动为卖点，吸引了不少玩家的目光。然而在我亲自体验过后，却发现这款游戏存在着诸多令人失望之处。

首先游戏的玩法设计显得单调且缺乏创新。在游戏中玩家需要控制一条蛇形角色在地图上移动，并尝试吃掉其他玩家或障碍物来增长自己的长度。然而这种玩法过于简单且重复，缺乏足够的挑战性和深度。玩家很快就能摸清游戏的规律和套路，导致游戏体验的重复性极高。

其次游戏的多人互动机制并不理想。虽然游戏支持多人在线对战，但玩家之间的互动和竞争并不激烈。地图设计过于简单，缺乏足够的策略和战术空间，使得多人对战变得单调乏味。同时游戏的匹配系统也存在问题，玩家经常遇到实力悬殊的对手，导致游戏体验的不平衡。

此外游戏的画面和音效也显得较为粗糙。画面的色彩和细节处理不够精细，无法给玩家带来良好的视觉体验。音效方面，游戏缺乏具有特色的音效设计，使得整个游戏过程显得平淡无奇。

最后游戏的平衡性和稳定性也是一大问题。在游戏中，一些玩家可能利用某些技巧或策略获得不公平的优势，导致游戏失去平衡性。同时游戏的稳定性也有待提高，时常会出现卡顿、延迟等问题，影响了玩家的游戏体验。

综上所述，这款派对游戏在玩法设计、多人互动、画面音效以及游戏平衡性等方面都存在着诸多令人失望之处。虽然它试图为玩家带来一段独特的蛇形派对体验，但最终却未能实现这一目标。如果你对派对游戏抱有期待，我建议你在选择这款游戏之前要三思而后行。

author: {'steamid': '76561198271811170', 'num_games_owned': 1931, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1593255790}
review:
其实这个游戏没那么差。他本来就不是单人玩的，而是一堆人一起玩，场面就很欢乐了，互相坑。
但这个游戏的问题是一不支持联网玩，人多了一个键盘不够用；二成就系统设置有问题，应该多设置多人游戏相关的成就，引导玩家用正确的方式玩。归根结底，这个游戏只是雏形，创意还算有趣，但离完成品还是很远的。
要拿全成就，最好看看指南，倒是不难。

author: {'steamid': '76561198098342214', 'num_games_owned': 10629, 'num_reviews': 595, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1590181589}
review:
[h1]Snake Party é um estilo de jogo da cobrinha apenas em modo LOCAL[/h1]

Bom o jogo em si é bem fraquinho, em um primeiro momento ele pode dar a impressão de ser o jogo da cobrinha das épocas do Nokia, mas não é, na verdade ele é um produto bem mais inferior e da a impressão de ser todo feito no Paint e isso não é ofender pois as semelhanças com o uso do Paint é enorme.
Infelizmente apenas contém um cenário que é todo preto e muito grande, então pra ser possível uma provável "jogatina divertida entre amigos", seria na minha opinião necessário pelo menos 4 jogadores para controlar 4 cobras no cenário, pois menos do que isso o jogo vai ficar uma coisa muito monótona. (É possível jogar até 6 jogadores ou seja 6 cobras no total).

[B]IMPORTANTE!![/B]
[b]Ele é apenas em modo local, ou seja, você não pode jogar ele se não tiver ninguém pra jogar contigo e quando eu digo alguém, seria fisicamente junto contigo no seu próprio teclado[/b] 

O jogo basicamente te da opções de movimentação pra esquerda e direita, com direito a mudar as teclas, então com isso seria possível várias pessoas jogar em um teclado só.
Tentei jogar com meu controle do Xbox 360 mas não deu certo, no entanto talvez seja possível utilizando outros meios, teria que pesquisar pra ver.

[b]Vale a pena comprar?[/b]
Olha infelizmente não. O jogo é muito simples, fraco, ainda nem todos vão poder jogar tendo em vista ser apenas modo Local
O problema mesmo é não ter ter outros modos e sim que o jogo é todo muito ultrapassado e com certeza não é nada divertido se jogado com menos de 3~4 pessoas
Quero deixar uma ressalva no entanto, de que se você for jogar esse jogo apenas pra conquistas, bom nesse caso talvez... possa valer a pena, mas fique ciente que isso quer dizer que você vai pagar R$2,29 pra desbloquear apenas 6 conquistas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198171339687', 'num_games_owned': 4711, 'num_reviews': 644, 'playtime_forever': 281, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1523007085}
review:
Énième itération du jeu Snake qui aurait dû se contenter de la formule originale. Ici, on a droit à une variante multijoueur du pauvre (local uniquement): graphismes niveau Amstrad, musique lourdingue en boucle sur un rythme de gameplay escargot, contrôles limités à gauche/droite (super original), bref rien d’excitant.

Quelques succès de complétion, une sauvegarde cloud pour les scores (?) et des tradings cards côté Steam.

Gratuit pourquoi pas, mais à 1 euro ça fait cher le projet de lycéen. Il y a mieux en gratuit pour du Snake sur Internet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078528278', 'num_games_owned': 2822, 'num_reviews': 298, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1523904458}
review:
[h1]Snake Party[/h1]

Отвратная пэинтовская игра. Управляете змеюкой, поворачивая стрелочками или цифрами 1 и 2 влево и вправо. 

В подобных играх огромное значение имеет то, как они выполнены в плане дизайна. Тут его нет вовсе. Отвращение вызывает. Игра очень долгая. Надо постараться, чтобы умереть.

Можно играть на одной клавиатуре с друзьями, но я не думаю, что они будут рады Вашему предложению. Да и Вам самим будет стыдно это предложить.

[h1]Итог:[/h1]
Не рекомендую. Глаза болеть будут.

[code][h1]Больше правдивых обзоров, информация в которых не высасывается из пальца, Вы можете увидеть, подписавшись на [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/30345054/]Куратора.[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198066346696', 'num_games_owned': 2239, 'num_reviews': 1253, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1497397562}
review:
Змейка на двух игроков. Один управляет движением "влево/вправо" на клавиши 1/2, а другой на стрелочках.
Нужно ли объяснять, что проигрывает тот, кто первым запнётся о стену или хвост(неважно чей).
Что интересно, так это периодическое "отваливание" хвоста змеек, притом это всегда происходит у каждой случайно.
А неинтересна сама игра... Пара минут и желание играть "отваливается" как хвост. Единственное, что частично правит ситуацию, так это наличие достижений, которые приходится набирать массовыми "выпилами" змей, путём зажатия любой из клавиш "влево", либо "вправо"(они таким образом делают круг и убиваются о свой хвост).
Также любопытно, что в раунде при зажатых одновременно клавишах у обоих змеек, практически всегда побеждает первая, хотя они в точности до миллисекунд самоубиваются одновременно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151167782', 'num_games_owned': 102, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1551479699}
review: Grafisch einfach überhaupt nicht ansprechend. Klar handelt es sich um ein "Snake" Spiel mit Tendenz richtung Trash aber das ist echt eine zumutung. Ich erwarte ja kein grafisches Meisterwerk, aber einzelne Pixel in der Schrift? Jetzt mal ehrlich. Die Menuführung ist auch eher so la-la. Gibt aber leider kein Spiel , welches das selbe Spielprinzip aufgreift. 0,99€ als Preis sind hingegen ganz ok, wenn man mal davon absieht, dass so etwas auf einem Mobilgerät Kostenlos wäre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049020554', 'num_games_owned': 4131, 'num_reviews': 374, 'playtime_forever': 85, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1496871803}
review:
Snake Party is a very crude game that is nothing special at all.

Essentialy, Snake Party is a game that is made with the premise of being a Snake game. However, the problem is that the game sucks. Like its just a bad game. The grahics are super minimalistic, reminiscent of somethign a 3rd grader can make. The gameplay is worse than regular snake games as the movement feels bad. There is also no fun to this game after playing a couple of rounds at all. There is literally nothing good or noteworthy about this game. Well I lied, there is only one good thing about this game and it is that it is a very easy 100% achievement game.

Overall, crap quality game that lows the overall Steam game quality.

Rating: 1.9/10
Recommend Price: $0.07 or below (only for the easy 100% achievements if you want it)

review: What a crap... don't get me wrong, the idea is good - google [i]Achtung! Die Kurve[/i], but this game? nothing original, ugly, boring.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067825006', 'num_games_owned': 382, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1491542786}
review:
チープなスネークゲーム。
ローカルで最大６人対戦が出来ます。キーも好きに割り振れます。３０分もあれば全実績解除可能。

恐らく最後に残る2つの実績の取り方…
100 Launches：100回ゲームスタート。右下の「ゲームスタートボタン」とEscキーを連打してれば取れます。
You must be crazy：ゲーム回数を1000回に設定。つまり、1000回連打。

author: {'steamid': '76561198052933734', 'num_games_owned': 4633, 'num_reviews': 571, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1490625986}
review:
ストアページの動画を見ての通り､糞ショボいスネークゲーム｡
オンラインマルチプレイはできない一方､ローカルマルチで
無駄に6キャラ分を操って一人遊びができる｡それだけ｡

トレカ・実績対応､日本語未対応だが問題なし｡価格は激安｡
全実績解除まで15分｡内容がショボすぎて溜息しか出ない｡
金で実績を買うことに抵抗がない人以外にはおすすめしない｡

author: {'steamid': '76561198118867020', 'num_games_owned': 703, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1499547214}
review:
Tolles Spiel für die nächste Party.
Zu zweit hatten wir schon die Tränen in den Augen. Zu dritt oder mehr muss es der Hammer sein!
Ist preiswert, (natürlich auch einfach gehalten), macht so richtig Spass ab 3 Personen, es gibt Errungenschaften und Sammelkarten!
Ich empfehle es weiter...!

author: {'steamid': '76561198119039255', 'num_games_owned': 2827, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1487415475}
review:
Deutsch / English

Auf der nächsten Party gibts was zu lachen.
Hier kann sogar die Oma mitmachen.
Hier sieht man mal wieder, das es nicht auf die Grafik ankommt,
um ein unterhaltsames Spiel zu kreieren!

Funktioniert einwandfrei...!
Win7 64...

------------------------------------------------------------------

At the next party there is something to laugh about.
Here, even the grandma can join.
Here you can see again, that it does not depend on the graphics,
to create an entertaining game!

Works flawlessly...!
Win7 64 ...

author: {'steamid': '76561198099194597', 'num_games_owned': 94, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1487514334}
review:
It doesn't work at all. So don't buy it right now
Will probably update when it does.

EDIT: We got it working. If it freezes for you need to install Directx manually in the game folder. Or you can just play in windowed mode (F4). Game is very fun to play with friends :)
